flawed_nl_solution:

He was able to use up 10 x 30 = <<10*30=30>>30 calories for jogging.
The net calorie intake of Will after jogging is 900 - 30 = <<900-30=870>>870.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 30. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
